00019 class VectorOf

00034                 m_ctAlloc=m_ct;

00037         void Release(){
00038                 if (AboutToDie()){
00039                         SafeDeleteArray(m_vt);
00040                 }
00041         }
00042 
00043         // this leaves undefined values at the end if c>m_ct
00044         void SetSizeUnsafe(int c)
00045         {
00046                 CONGEAL_ASSERT(c<m_ctAlloc);
00047                 m_ct=c;
00048         }

00054                 m_ctAlloc=0;
00055                 m_ct=0;
00056                 m_vt=NULL;
00057         }

00059         ~VectorOf() ALWAYS_INLINE
00060         {
00061                 Release();
00062         }

00064 
00065         VectorOf(const T* vt, int ct)  ALWAYS_INLINE
00066                 : Counted()
00067         {
00068                 m_ctAlloc = congeal_max(1<<int(ceil(log2(ct))),32);
00069                 m_ct=ct;
00070                 m_vt = new T [m_ctAlloc];
00071                 if (vt!=NULL){
00072                         memcpy(m_vt,vt,m_ct*sizeof(T));
00073                 }
00074         }

00079                 m_vt=vec.m_vt;

00082         }

00089                 m_ct=vec.m_ct;

00142         VectorOf<T> operator + (const VectorOf<T>& vec)
00143         {
00144                 VectorOf<T> vecOut;
00145                 vecOut.EnsureSpace(C()+vec.C());

00154                 return *this;

00157         void Append(const T* vt, int c)
00158         {
00159                 if (vt==NULL){
00160                         CONGEAL_ASSERTf(
00161                                 c<=0,
00162                                 "trying to append null pointer which is reported as not empty %d", 
00163                                 c);
00164                         return;
00165                 }
00166                 if (c<=0){
00167                         return;
00168                 }
00169 
00170                 EnsureSpace(m_ct + c);
00171                 memcpy(&m_vt[m_ct],vt,c*sizeof(T));
00172                 m_ct+=c;
00173         }
00174 
00175         void Append(const T& t)
00176         {
00177                 EnsureSpace(m_ct+1);
00178                 m_vt[m_ct]=t;
00179                 m_ct++;
00180         }
00181 
00182         void EnsureSpace(int c)
00183         {
00184                 if (c>m_ctAlloc){
00185                         m_ctAlloc = congeal_max(1<<int(ceil(log2(c))),32);
00186                         T* vtT = new T [m_ctAlloc];
00187                         if (m_vt!=NULL){
00188                                 memcpy(vtT,m_vt,m_ct*sizeof(T));
00189                                 delete [] m_vt;
00190                         }
00191                         m_vt=vtT;
00192                 }
00193         }
00194 
00195         // this leaves undefined values at the end if c>m_ct
00196         void SetSize(int c)
00197         {
00198                 EnsureSpace(c);
00199                 m_ct=c;
00200         }
